question: who sang on the back in black album
api_result: The "Back in Black" album by AC/DC features Brian Johnson as the lead vocalist. This album was released in 1980 and was the first to feature Johnson, who replaced the band's previous lead singer Bon Scott following his death in 1980. The album is one of the best-selling albums of all time and includes some of AC/DC's most famous tracks, such as "Back in Black," "You Shook Me All Night Long," and "Hells Bells."
